Hotels.about: Hamburger, a sandwich consisting of one or more cooked beef patties, placed inside a sliced bread roll or bun roll
A hot dog is a food consisting of a grilled or steamed sausage served in the slit of a partially sliced bun.
It is made with Indian spices, vegetables, rice, and usually some type of meat (chicken, beef, goat, prawn, and fish),
Ice cream is a frozen dessert, typically made from milk or cream and flavoured with a sweetener
